description: Lists the applied quota values for the specified AWS service.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Listing service quotas provides detailed information about the configuration and resource limits within an AWS environment. This information helps attackers understand the system's structure, enabling them to identify potential areas for exploitation or further reconnaissance.
By retrieving quota values, attackers can access stored data within AWS repositories, which could be used to inform further actions or planning.
Filtering by account or resource level when retrieving quotas may expose details about which permissions are associated with different accounts or roles.
Listing quotas can reveal which AWS services are in use and their configurations, helping attackers map out the environment and understand what services are available.

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListServiceQuotas to identify potential services to exploit by understanding their usage limits.
